items.sentence: I don't think a native speaker would ever say it that way, but I can understand the intended meaning.
Why did I buy flowers? Why are you asking me such a question? I just bought them because I wanted to.
People always say that when you kiss a frog, it'll turn into a prince, but I've never seen it happen.
One of the most important skills a debater can have is to deliver cogent arguments in a clear manner.
Tom was acquitted of the charge of stealing money from Mary, but was found guilty of attempted fraud.
I woke up one morning to find that all the bills in my wallet had turned into two-thousand yen bills.
It looks like it may rain today. I'm worried that our cherry-blossom-viewing party might be canceled.
Banks will try to lend you an umbrella on a sunny day, but they will turn their backs on a rainy day.
The Oxford comma is awkward, unnecessary, and cannot be carried over to languages other than English.
Grammatically there is nothing wrong with this sentence, but I think it would never actually be used.
If you're tired of arguing with strangers on the Internet, try talking with one of them in real life.
The doctors thought he was dead, but today he is still alive and healthy, and has a job and a family.
Farming looks mighty easy when your plow is a pencil and you're a thousand miles from the corn field.
My neighbors never complain about how loud my parties are because I always invite them to my parties.
Memories came flooding back when Tom found some photos from his childhood in an old box in the attic.
Recently Tom and I seem to just keep missing each other. I never seem to be able to meet up with him.
Tom is always sleeping in class. It almost seems like he goes to school just to catch up on his sleep.
Tom rolled out of bed at 6:30, shuffled into the kitchen and put two slices of bread into the toaster.
Tom was determined not to make the same mistakes with his children that his parents had made with him.
My father, grandfather, great-grandfather and great-great-grandfather all had the same name as I have.
